title: T3 Turkey Reds -lower grades, priced to sell - NEW 12/20/12
author: T3s

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Reds -lower grades, priced to sell - NEW 12/20/12
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I recently picked up a group of lower-grade T3s.  Once I saw them first hand, they're actually nicer than I thought they would be.

I think these are priced to sell. 

Happy to send scans.  As always, happy to work with you on pricing (feel free to make offers) and volume discounts.  These are nice collectible cards and I am sure you will enjoy them.  (o/w stands for otherwise).

Here you go:

5. Crawford - decent card, VG-  $350
11. Dahlen - stain @ bottom left corner tip, o/w nice VGEX SOLD
13. Doyle - light creasing & scratches, decent VG  $125
15. Elberfeld - stain upper left border o/w nice VG+  $140
18. Jennings - decent card, presents VG $350
19. Joss - 2 dots of paperloss near name o/w solid VGEX, no creases  $350
22. Krause - stain @ bottom left corner tip o/w nice VG+  $135
25. McIntyre - 1" tear @ top border o/w VG+  SOLD
33. Pfeister - top right corner crease, nice clean card VGEX  $150
34. Rucker - 1/2 dime size piece missing on side o/w VG  SOLD
36. Speaker - light horiz crease neck high o/w nice VG  $650
38. Stahl - pinhole tears at top & bottom o/w VG+  SOLD
40. Willis - p/h top center o/w decent VG-  $165
48. Murray - top border stain o/w nice VGEX  $140
78. Baker - damage on forehead o/w VG  $150
92. Dygert - light creasing & scratches, decent VG-  $110
98. Hofman - spots of paperloss & scratches /w VGEX, no creases  $110
105. Lobert - mark near name o/w VGEX+, no creases, nice  $165
107. Manning - 3" vertical tear on bottom border o/w VG  SOLD
109. Moran - 2 very small spots of paperloss o/w VG+  SOLD
117. Schulte - 3 very small spots of paperloss o/w VG  $115

Please email me at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]  or include email address when sending PM request for scans.  Thanks for looking!

Happy Collecting,
Craig
Received cards today, they're great.  Thanks.
